author: Jasmine Henry
title: Gaming YouTubers Are Being Shafted by Stingy Advertisers
description: A new report reveals that more people are watching gaming YouTubers but lower ad rates mean that they are making less money. The post Gaming YouTubers Are Being Shafted by Stingy Advertisers appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• More people are staying home and watching gaming YouTube videos but creators arent seeing the rewards.
  • YouTube creators report that their earnings have dropped by around 50% over the last two months.
